About Me

A few things about me...

Technical Work History and Experience

John Santos lives and works in San Antonio, Texas. For over fourteen years, as a SysAdmin, John has serviced both enterprise and medium size businesses for a industry leading web hosting provider. During this time, John has worked as a Data Center Technician, Web Server Administrator, System Engineer, and Data Protection Specialist. Recently, John has shifted his focus from IT Support to Front-end Web Development. Over the past three years he has worked on several personal and public facing projects that demonstrate his knowledge of HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and DOM manipulation with JavaScript, JQuery, and React.

Rackspace

10/2010 - 08/2019

Backup System Administrator III

  • Configure image level, file system, and application level backup schemes.
  • Troubleshoot client and media side infrastructure monitoring alerts.
  • Work high priority and escalated tickets.
  • Conduct software reversion testing.
  • Create and deliver technical support training.
  • Create, edit and review internal knowledge base technical articles.

Backup & Storage Engineer I

  • Deploy and maintain Lin/Win servers, robotic tape libraries and SAN arrays and NAS appliances.
  • Monitor resource utlization and respond to applicatoin and service alerts.
  • Create and track third-party vendor incident tickets.
  • Administrative duties included system patching, hardware upgrade and replacement, and system performance tuning.
